attributes.action: jody miles, richard miles, brian nelson
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: why when we pay road tax and so much for fuel with loads of TAX put on top mot and insurance to now pay to take my kids to a state school when this place is so mesed up i can olny just afford to live how i am now going to afford it its hard to get jobs cox of the foreigners u let in taking jobs and money of our goverment and u leave the british with nothing some people havnt got as much money as u so what u going to do?i say send them all back and get some one else in your seat i hope one day your as poor as me then you may understand until then people shouldnt pay all this extra money and if it dose happen my kids will have to stay at home and before you say its to far to walk so think about it?

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
